text: @SteveGuest @realDonaldTrump Yes while Americans who has lost their job with healthcare attached to their jobs were sleeping. How cruel like a thief in the night. Putting hospitalized Americans with covid-19  out. All because Obama conducted himself like a President for the people and not like a thug ➡️Trump https://t.co/C0FRxUARf6
